com.bendb.dropwizard.redis

Class JedisFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bendb.dropwizard.redis.JedisFactory

  • public class JedisFactory
extends Object
    A factory for creating configured JedisPool instances.

    Configuration Parameters

    Name Default Value Description
    endpoint [required] The redis server's host and port, i.e. localhost:6379. If no port is given, the default redis port 6379 is assumed.
    minIdle 0 The minimum number of idle connections to maintain in the connection pool.
    maxIdle 0 The maximum number of idle connections to maintain in the connection pool.
    maxTotal The maximum number of connections allowed in the connection pool.
